alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pope; Van Buren; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 1:22AM CST until January 01 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... South central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Conway County in central Arkansas... East central Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 121 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carden Bottoms, or 11 miles southeast of Russellville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Clinton... Greenbrier... Atkins... Pottsville... Wooster... Oppelo... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Bethlehem... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Happy Bend... Hattieville... Whipple... Blick... Carden Bottoms... Solgohachia... Claude... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 88 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pope; Van Buren; Yell
